metadata.comments: This playbook will assign Incident owner based on Shifts list in Teams.
metadata.author: Jeremy Tan

Compose_HTML.inputs:
Severity:@{body('Parse_Incident_JSON')?['properties']?['severity']} Title: @{body('Parse_Incident_JSON')?['properties']?['title']}
The following incident in Azure Sentinel has been assigned to @{body('Get_user')?['displayName']}.

Incident Details:

Incident Number: @{body('Parse_Incident_Body')?['properties']?['CaseNumber']}
Title: @{body('Parse_Incident_Body')?['properties']?['Title']}
Owner: @{body('Get_user')?['displayName']}
Severity: @{body('Parse_Incident_Body')?['properties']?['Severity']}
TimeGenerated(UTC): @{body('Parse_Incident_Body')?['properties']?['CreatedTimeUtc']}
Status: @{body('Parse_Incident_JSON')?['properties']?['status']}

Incident link: View Incident
@{body('Parse_Incident_JSON')?['properties']?['tactics']}

inputs.body:
let ShiftUsers= datatable(User:string)
@{outputs('Compose_-_User_Array')}
| distinct User;
SecurityIncident
| extend UserID = tostring(parse_json(Owner).objectId)
| where isnotempty(UserID)
| distinct IncidentName, UserID
| summarize count() by UserID
| join kind=rightouter ShiftUsers on $left.UserID == $right.User
| project User, Count=iif(isempty(count_),0,count_)
| top 1 by Count asc

body.Subject: Azure Sentinel Incident Assignment Notification - Incident Number: @{body('Parse_Incident_Body')?['properties']?['CaseNumber']}
